name: Spectacular Maro Planet
description:
In this game inspired by the N64 era of video games, you take on the role of Maro who is definitely not Mario because that would be copyright infringement. Maro has to defeat the Rat King after rats have taken over the world.

This is very very early in development and currently has only one level, as you will see in the game there is room for many more but ive decided to put the game on hold for the foreseeable future.
